b2bpl.translation
Class SpecificationTranslator

java.lang.Object
  b2bpl.translation.SpecificationTranslator

public class SpecificationTranslator
extends java.lang.Object

A translator for BML specifications.

This translator can be used to translate BML specification expressions appearing in a whole variety of contexts:

  • in object invariants
  • in method specifications (pre-/post-/exceptional-post-conditions)
  • in local instruction annotations (assertions, assumptions, ...)
  • in loop specifications
The translator must be parameterized with the names of the variables relevant to the context in which the BML specification appears. Since this parameterization differs significantly, specialized factory methods are provided for constructing translators for the different contexts.

Author:
Ovidio Mallo

oldLocalVariables

protected final java.lang.String[] oldLocalVariables
The names of the old local variables to use in the translation.

boundVariables

protected final java.util.List<java.lang.String> boundVariables
A list of the currently active bound variables. When translating an exceptional postcondition, BML treats the exception object thrown as a bound variable, so it will also be included in this list. Other bound variables originate from BML quantifier expressions.

Constructor Detail

SpecificationTranslator

protected SpecificationTranslator(java.lang.String heap,
                                  java.lang.String oldHeap,
                                  java.lang.String thisReference,
                                  java.lang.String resultOrException,
                                  java.lang.String[] localVariables,
                                  java.lang.String[] stackElements,
                                  java.lang.String[] oldLocalVariables)
Constructor with all the possible parameterizations of a specification translator.

Parameters:
heap - The name of the current heap variable.
oldHeap - The name of the old heap variable.
thisReference - The name of the variable representing the this object.
resultOrException - The name of the variable representing the method's return value inside a normal postcondition, or else, the exception object thrown inside an exceptional postcondition.
localVariables - The names of the local variables.
stackElements - The names of the stack variables.
oldLocalVariables - The names of the old local variables.

                                                   java.lang.String thisReference)
Static factory method for creating a specification translator appropriate for translating object invariants.

Parameters:
heap - The name of the current heap variable.
thisReference - The name of the variable representing the this object.
Returns:
A specification translator for translating object invariants.

                                                      java.lang.String[] parameters)
Static factory method for creating a specification translator appropriate for translating method preconditions.

forPostcondition

public static SpecificationTranslator forPostcondition(java.lang.String heap,
                                                       java.lang.String oldHeap,
                                                       java.lang.String resultOrException,
                                                       java.lang.String[] parameters)
Static factory method for creating a specification translator appropriate for translating normal or exceptional method postconditions.

Parameters:
heap - The name of the current heap variable.
oldHeap - The name of the old heap variable.
resultOrException - The name of the variable representing the method's return value inside a normal postcondition, or else, the exception object thrown inside an exceptional postcondition.
parameters - The names of the method's parameters.
Returns:
A specification translator for translating normal or exceptional method postconditions.

forLocalSpecification

public static SpecificationTranslator forLocalSpecification(java.lang.String heap,
                                                            java.lang.String oldHeap,
                                                            java.lang.String[] localVariables,
                                                            java.lang.String[] stackElements,
                                                            java.lang.String[] parameters)
Static factory method for creating a specification translator appropriate for translating local BML annotations attached to instructions such as assertions, loop specifications, ....

Parameters:
heap - The name of the current heap variable.
oldHeap - The name of the old heap variable.
localVariables - The names of the local variables.
stackElements - The names of the stack variables.
parameters - The parameter names of the method in which the specification appears (used as the old local variables).
Returns:
A specification translator for translating local specifications.

translate

public BPLExpression translate(TranslationContext context,
                               BMLExpression specification)
Performs the actual translation of the given BML specification and returns a BoogiePL expression representing it.

Parameters:
context - The TranslationContext to be used for translating type/field/constant/... references.
specification - The specification to be translated.
Returns:
The BoogiePL expression resulting from the translation of the given BML specification.
